casebody.data:
(October 31, 1958)

(Republished)

Robert P. Shaw v. Susan Prestigiacomo et al.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied, with $10 costs, with leave to serve an amended complaint within five days after the entry of the order herein. Concur—-Breitel, J. P., M. M. Frank, Valente, McNally and Stevens, JJ.
